Package org.apache.archiva.redback.common.ldap.role

Interface LdapRoleMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLdapRoleMapper
    public interface LdapRoleMapper
    will map ldap group to redback role
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Olivier Lamy

    • Method Summary

      • getAllGroupObjects

        List<LdapGroup> getAllGroupObjects​(DirContext context)
                            throws MappingException
        Read all groups from LDAP and return the list of group objects.
        Returns:
        all LDAP groups found in the LDAP directory
        Throws:
        MappingException

        Returns:

      • saveRole

        boolean saveRole​(String roleName,
                 DirContext context)
          throws MappingException
        will save a ldap group corresponding to the mapping. will do nothing in group already exists.
        Parameters:
        roleName -
        Returns:
        true if role was added, false if role already exists
        Throws:
        MappingException

      • saveUserRole

        boolean saveUserRole​(String roleName,
                     String username,
                     DirContext context)
              throws MappingException
        associate role to user in ldap
        Parameters:
        roleName -
        username -
        Returns:
        true if role was added to user, false if role already exists for the user
        Throws:
        MappingException
